hero.title: Your Trusted Partner for
hero.subtitle: Expert immigration consulting services to help you navigate your journey to Canada. From work permits to permanent residence, we provide professional guidance every step of the way.

services.title: Immigration Services to Canada
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of immigration services to help you achieve your goal of living, working, or studying in Canada.

permanentResidence.title: Permanent Residence
permanentResidence.desc: Expert guidance on Express Entry, PNP, and other pathways to becoming a permanent resident of Canada.

studyPermits.title: Study Permits
studyPermits.desc: Help with choosing the right institution and securing your study permit to start your education in Canada.

workPermits.title: Work Permits
workPermits.desc: Assistance with LMIA-exempt and LMIA-required work permits to help you legally work in Canada.

familyImmigration.title: Family Sponsorship
familyImmigration.desc: Bringing your loved ones to Canada through spousal, parental, and other family sponsorship programs.

howItWorks.title: Your Journey to Canada Made Simple
howItWorks.subtitle: Follow our proven 4-step process to navigate the Canadian immigration system with confidence.

createAccount.title: Create Your Account
createAccount.desc: Sign up on our secure platform and provide your initial details to get started.

submitDocs.title: Submit Documents
submitDocs.desc: Upload your required documents through our encrypted portal for initial assessment.

consultantAnalysis.title: Consultant Analysis
consultantAnalysis.desc: Our ICCRC certified consultants will review your profile and recommend the best pathway.

trackUpdate.title: Track & Update
trackUpdate.desc: Monitor your application status in real-time and receive personalized updates.

security.title: Security & Canadian Compliance
security.subtitle: Your data is protected by the highest industry standards and stored locally in Canada.

docs.title: Encrypted Document Upload
docs.desc: Bank-level security for all your documents

sarah.quote: The platform made it so easy to track my Express Entry application. I always knew exactly what was happening.

ahmed.quote: Excellent service and professional consultants. My study permit was approved faster than I expected.

elena.quote: I highly recommend Larouss Immigration. They helped me reunite with my family in Canada.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions about your immigration journey? Our expert team is here to help. Contact us today for a free consultation.

form.title: Send Us a Message
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your immigration needs...
form.successDesc: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you within 24 hours.

responseTime.question: How quickly can I expect a response?
responseTime.answer: We typically respond to all inquiries within 24 hours during business days. For urgent matters, please call our phone line directly.

virtualConsultations.question: Do you offer virtual consultations?
virtualConsultations.answer: Yes! We offer both in-person and virtual consultations via video call. You can meet with our experts from anywhere in the world.

initialConsultation.question: Is the initial consultation free?
initialConsultation.answer: Yes, we offer a free initial assessment to discuss your immigration goals and determine the best pathway for you.
